mapper.select: SELECT A.PASSWORD, A.NICKNAME, A.EMAIL, A.REG_DATE, A.LAST_LOGIN, A.AUTHORITY, A.ENABLE FROM (SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 rownum, A.* FROM (SELECT A.USER_ID, A.PASSWORD, A.NICKNAME, A.EMAIL, A.REG_DATE, A.LAST_LOGIN, A.AUTHORITY, A.ENABLE FROM NAMDODB.USER A)A WHERE (@rownum:=0)=0)A limit #{pageIndex}, 10

SELECT A.BOARD_ID, A.POST_ID, A.POST_NM, A.USER_NM, A.POST_DATE, A.HITS, A.LIKE, A.DISLIKE, A.CONTENT FROM (SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 rownum, A.* FROM (SELECT A.BOARD_ID, B.POST_ID, B.POST_NM, B.USER_NM, B.POST_DATE, B.HITS, C.LIKE, C.DISLIKE, D.CONTENT FROM NAMDODB.BOARD A INNER JOIN NAMDODB.POST B ON A.BOARD_ID = B.BOARD_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT A.POST_ID POST_ID, COUNT(CASE WHEN A.FAVOR='LIKE' THEN 1 END) AS 'LIKE', COUNT(CASE WHEN A.FAVOR='DISLIKE' THEN 1 END) AS 'DISLIKE' FROM NAMDODB.POST_FAVOR A GROUP BY A.POST_ID)C ON B.POST_ID = C.POST_ID INNER JOIN NAMDODB.POST_CONTENT D ON B.POST_ID = D.POST_ID ORDER BY B.POST_ID DESC)A WHERE (@rownum:=0)=0)A limit #{pageIndex}, 10
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(A.USER_ID)/10) FROM(SELECT A.USER_ID, A.PASSWORD, A.NICKNAME, A.EMAIL, A.REG_DATE, A.LAST_LOGIN, A.AUTHORITY, A.ENABLE FROM NAMDODB.USER A)A

SELECT CEIL(COUNT(A.BOARD_ID) / 10) FROM (SELECT A.BOARD_ID, B.POST_ID, B.POST_NM, B.USER_NM, B.POST_DATE, B.HITS, C.LIKE, C.DISLIKE FROM NAMDODB.BOARD A INNER JOIN NAMDODB.POST B ON A.BOARD_ID = B.BOARD_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT A.POST_ID POST_ID, COUNT(CASE WHEN A.FAVOR='LIKE' THEN 1 END) AS 'LIKE', COUNT(CASE WHEN A.FAVOR='DISLIKE' THEN 1 END) AS 'DISLIKE' FROM NAMDODB.POST_FAVOR A GROUP BY A.POST_ID)C ON B.POST_ID = C.POST_ID ORDER BY B.POST_ID DESC) A
